body:
Comment 2: 
Always a good idea to check the error returns.  ;-)

It's useful for repeated to tell the truth; I think skipping nils is not good behavior.
If you want to test for the nil value you can use

{.repeated section list}
{.section @}
the value is not nil
{.else}
the value is nil
{.end}
{.end}
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
